Class Card

java.lang.Object
Card
public class Card extends Object
The Card class within the UNO game which represents a card in the UNO game. Each card has a value and a colour
Author:
Aashna Verma 101225434 - modified for flip

    • validWith

      public boolean validWith(Card compareTo)
      Checks if compareTo could be played on this card or the other way around
      Parameters:
      compareTo - the card to be compared with
      Returns:
      true if playing compareTo on this would be a valid move, false otherwise
